title: SimCenter WE-UQ CFD Modeling of Generic Tall Building
description: JSON Schema for representing a the geometry and orientation of a tall building

buildingWidth.description: Width of the face perpendicular to x-axis

buildingDepth.description: Width of the face perpendicular to y-axis

geometricScale.description: Geometric scale at which the simulation is caried out.

windDirection.description: Approaching wind direction measured from x-axis

lengthUnit.description: Units for the building geometry, the default is in meters.

angleUnit.description: Units for the wind direction, the default is in degrees.
